ab.note: There is a sign indicating a marginal note. But the note cannot be find on the page. Probably, it indicates a correction adding the missing χρυσ(ι)ω.
Probably Spiritus lenis (cf. the following instances on the next page).
There seems to be a liitle colophon, but its text is mostly unreadable.
